Fedora wanted to increase the performance of the openssl directory-hash by
dropping the old cert.pem file.  This means removing ca-certificates.crt
file.  The new file is /etc/pki/ca-trust/extracted/pem/tls-ca-bundle.pem.

Point the curl configure file to the new location.

See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Changes/droppingOfCertPemFile.
